rules_text:
Essex Laboratory enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
{3}{UB}: Until end of turn, Essex Laboratory becomes a 3/2 Mutant creature with “Whenever this creature attacks, surveil 1.” It's still a land. Activate only once each turn. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)[/i]
